channel.title: Justinxg27's Project 508 - Core Base With Core Features
channel.description:
Sorry for the like 3-4 month wait just to upload it, and all the pm's I ignored... I really wasn't bothered even opening it.. Anyways, I fucked up the player options, so fix them up yourself. [size=18pt]Random Event System added for bot-able skills, even though no skills currently added besides shitty combat. (100% credits to Davidi2) :) [/size] [size=18pt]Mini Tut On Adding It To Skills[/size] First find the object case in objectoption1.java For example Mining - case 6671: [code] p.mi = new Mining(p); p.mi.startCutting(p.clickId); [/code] All you got to do it add a if and else statement which checks randomly if the random number is under 25, example: [code] *Case Here* if(Misc.random(50) < 25) { p.mi = new Mining(p); p.mi.startCutting(p.clickId); } else { p.randomEvent(); } [/code] So whenever you add it to you specific skill just remember to have: [code] if(Misc.random(50) < 25) { ---------------Insert Skill Code Here :)------------------ } else { p.randomEvent(); } [/code] Yes It's very incomplete, but it has some core features and is stable. Quote from my Dev topic:
[size=24pt]Features:[/size] Trading 100% - No glitches, all fixed Player vs Player & Player vs NPC 90% - It's basically perfect, animations everything. Npc follow after attack 100% - Stops walking after you're far away enough Split Chat Private Messaging 100% - Enabled on login Very Stable - No D'C's so far. Most npc's drop items - Of course not all. 100% SkillCapes 100% Following when attacking a player. 100% Skill Menus - All working Perfectly. 95% World Map - Fixing a glitch after you close it, everything goes black. 100% Prayer - All work perfect - Uses its own Handler Summoning - Removed due to me fucking it up. There's more, just forgot to write this stuff down. [size=24pt]Pictures for eye-candy.[/size] World Map: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/worldmap.png[/img] Wildy Jumping: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/WildyJumping.png[/img] Split Chat PM'ing: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/SplitChat.png[/img] Skill Menu's: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/SkillMenu.png[/img] Skillcapes: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/skillcapeEmote.png[/img] Npc Following after attack: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/npcFollowing.png[/img] Npc item drops: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/NpcDrops.png[/img] Npc Die animation: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/NpcDieanim.png[/img] Range Animation: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/DarkBowPVP.png[/img]
[center][b]Download:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?y1zs1gx8mxauc0r [B]UPDATED WITH DAVIDI2'S RANDOM EVENT FEATURE:[/B] http://www.mediafire.com/?3mu6lbu71nxtj8s [/center]

Though, I do know there are multiple frames in 317s to reset and clear the screen.
Aren’t those frames in 500+ as well?[/quote]That’s what removeshowninterface basically does IIRC. The world map is special though… if I had my source on here I would figure it out, but cbf atm.

item.title: Justinxg27's Project 508 - Core Base With Core Features
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:370104”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=466224.msg3410828#msg3410828 date=1290669501]

102 views, 1 comment LOL

That means 102 new leechers and 1 honest person
[/quote]Or 102 people that didn’t download the source, we can’t really tell.

Ontopic - You fixed the going black glitch right (after world map)?
As for the features, can’t really comment on parts of it, because it’s just opening already created interfaces (skill menus, world map).
But following looks good. Also, stability can’t really be tested when it’s just you and maybe another account on, try it with more connections (from outside localhost).
Nice job on trading.
Split chat is mostly just a boolean, so no comment.
Summoning would have been a nice feature to have.
And I can’t really tell from your picture, how far does NPC following go? I know any servers that even attempted to add it ended up with either a few bugs or it being un-finished (ex: the npc will follow you anywhere) I had fixed part of it but still had a few bugs in mine too (is that what you meant when you said you messed up summoning?)

Overall, not bad.[/quote]
When you run away from the npc it will stop following you, though if you walk it will follow you for like 10 steps. As for the skill menus, It’s a bit more than just opening an interface if I remember correctly
As for the world map, it would null beforehand, not just opening an interface lols
As for the summoning, well I gave up with the item on interface requirement charms, lols x)

Thanks for a real comment.

Update: I plan on working on a construction system, starting tonight.

Read full topic
item.source: Justinxg27's Project 508 - Core Base With Core Features
